Package co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.api.notification

Interface MceNotificationAction

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DataMceNotificationAction, MceInputNotificationAction, MceNotificationOperation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DelayedNotificationAction, MceNotificationActionImpl
    public interface MceNotificationAction
    This interface is for custom notification action implementation

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • handleAction

        void handleAction​(android.content.Context context,
                  java.lang.String type,
                  java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String attribution,
                  java.lang.String mailingId,
                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> payload,
                  boolean fromNotification)
        This method is called when a notification action is clicked.
        Parameters:
        context - The application context
        type - The notification action type
        name - The notification action name (can be null)
        attribution - The notification attribution (can be null)
        mailingId - The notification mailing id
        payload - The notification payload. The map contains the key value pairs from the notification action payload.
        fromNotification - true if this action is called from a notification and false otherwise

      • init

        void init​(android.content.Context context,
          org.json.JSONObject initOptions)
        Initiates the action with the given options
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context
        initOptions - The initialization options

      • update

        void update​(android.content.Context context,
            org.json.JSONObject updateOptions)
        Updates the action with the given options - not is use yet
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context
        updateOptions - The update options

      • shouldDisplayNotification

        boolean shouldDisplayNotification​(android.content.Context context,
                                  NotificationDetails notificationDetails,
                                  android.os.Bundle sourceBundle)
        This method is called when a notification with this action as its main action. If it returns false, the notification will not be shown. This can be used in case there are preparations needed before the notification can be shown.
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context
        notificationDetails - The received notification
        sourceBundle - The bundle that contained the notification
        Returns:
        true to show the notification and false to not show it

      • shouldSendDefaultEvent

        boolean shouldSendDefaultEvent​(android.content.Context context)
        This method is called when a with action is clicked. If it returns true, the default sdk event for action click will be sent. If this action sends its own event, it should return false.
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context
        Returns:
        true to send the default click event, false otherwise
